reviewText: I am a fan of sexy Shao Yin-Yin, so I wanted to see this movie, and I found it at Amazon.com. She resmbles one of my best friends Chu Bi-Chen. Near the beginning, she rides a bicycle nude and displays her great figure. Chen Ping is the "baddest" girl in this movie. She does not take any "ngao si" from men. This is sort of a Chinese Women's Liberation work. Miss Shao and another girl join Miss Chen to protect their rights. Chen Kuan-Tai is a man who is sympathetic to the three pretty ladies. He is a skillful martial artist, and his help is needed in the climactic battle.
